dao.name: QRY_HC_ADJFOLIO_ALL_DT2
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, adjfolio_cod, seq_nos, item_nos from hc_adjfolio_dt2 where athena_id = ? and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(?) and trim(adjfolio_cod)= trim(?)

dao.name: QRY_HC_ADJFOLIO_DT2
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, adjfolio_cod, seq_nos, item_nos from hc_adjfolio_dt2 where athena_id = ? and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(?) and trim(seq_nos) = trim(?) and trim(adjfolio_cod)= trim(?) order by seq_nos

dao.name: QRY_HC_ADJFOLIO_DT2_DISABLE_ITEM
dao.statement: select DISTINCT item_nos, seq_nos from hc_adjfolio_dt2 where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(seq_nos) != trim(:seq_nos) and trim(adjfolio_cod)= trim(:adjfolio_cod) order by seq_nos
